LanguageData.CE_Apparel_MeleeShield.label: melee shield
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_MeleeShield.description: Simple shield that can block simple projectiles and hits with melee weapons.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_BallisticShield.label: ballistic shield
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_BallisticShield.description: A heavy shield designed to protect against gunfire. It can cover most of the wearer's body but restricts use of two-handed weapons. Its heavy weight and bulk make it unwieldy in combat.
